languages.text: "Больно знать, что по моей вине ты пережил{mf||а} столько бед. И продолжаешь страдать — на этой проклятой арене, в этом проклятом городе. Я тоже..." {n}Ирлиэт неуверенно замолкает, словно не решаясь продолжить.{/n} "Моя душа истерзана, элантах. Потеря Крудараха, ужасы Комморры и то, что Темные пытались перевоспитать меня... Я заплатила за все сполна. Потеряла свой путь и больше... не могу медитировать. Ни моя душа, ни мое тело отныне не знают покоя. А значит, Та, Что Жаждет, вскоре обратит на меня свой хищный взор".

"It pains me to know the hardships you had to endure because of me. And you still suffer — in this cursed arena, in this cursed city. I also..." {n}Yrliet pauses as if hesitant to continue.{/n} "My soul is crushed, elantach. The loss of Crudarach, the horrors of Commorragh, and the Drukhari's attempts to re-educate me... I have fully paid the price. I have lost my Path and can no longer... meditate. My body and my soul know no peace now. And that means that She Who Thirsts will soon turn her predatory gaze on me."
languages.original_text: "Больно знать, что по моей вине ты пережил{mf||а} столько бед. И продолжаешь страдать — на этой проклятой арене, в этом проклятом городе. Я тоже..." {n}Ирлиэт неуверенно замолкает, словно не решаясь продолжить.{/n} "Моя душа истерзана, элантах. Потеря Крудараха, ужасы Комморры и то, что Темные пытались перевоспитать меня... Я заплатила за все сполна. Потеряла свой путь и больше... не могу медитировать. Ни моя душа, ни мое тело отныне не знают покоя. А значит, Та, Что Жаждет, вскоре обратит на меня свой хищный взор".

traits.locale_text: "It pains me to know what hardships you had to go through because of me. And you still suffer — on this cursed arena, in this cursed city. I'm, too..." {n}Yrliet pauses, as if hesitant to continue.{/n} "My soul is crushed, elantach. The loss of Crudarach, the horrors of Commorragh and the fact that the Drukhari tried to re-educate me... I have fully paid the price: have lost my Path and cannot... meditate anymore. Neither my body, nor my soul know the peace now. And that means She Who Thirsts will soon turn her predatory gaze to me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It pains me to know what hardships you had to go through because of me. And you still suffer — on this cursed arena, in this cursed city. And that means She Who Thirsts will soon turn her predatory gaze to me."

I also..." {n}Yrliet pauses as if hesitant to continue.{/n} "My soul is crushed, elantach. The loss of Crudarach, the horrors of Commorragh, and the Drukhari's attempts to re-educate me... I have fully paid the price. I have lost my Path and can no longer... meditate. My body and my soul know no peace now. And that means that She Who Thirsts will soon turn her predatory gaze on me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “都是因为我的缘故，你受了很多苦，这让我很难过。而你仍然在这个被诅咒的竞技场、被诅咒的城市里遭受折磨，我也……”{n}伊莉耶特犹豫片刻，似乎不知道该不该说下去。{/n}“我的灵魂崩溃了。我失去了克鲁达拉赫，目睹了科摩罗的恐怖，还有黑暗灵族对我的折磨……我也付出了相应的代价。我迷失了我的道途，我再也不能……冥想了。我的身体和灵魂再也没有一刻安宁，饥渴女士很快会将垂涎的目光集中在我的身上。”
languages.original_text: "It pains me to know the hardships you had to endure because of me. And you still suffer — in this cursed arena, in this cursed city. I also..." {n}Yrliet pauses as if hesitant to continue.{/n} "My soul is crushed, elantach. The loss of Crudarach, the horrors of Commorragh, and the Drukhari's attempts to re-educate me... I have fully paid the price. I have lost my Path and can no longer... meditate. My body and my soul know no peace now. And that means that She Who Thirsts will soon turn her predatory gaze on me."

traits.locale_text: “都是因为我的缘故，你受了很多苦，这让我很难过。而你仍然在这个被诅咒的竞技场、被诅咒的城市里遭受折磨，我也……”{n}伊莉耶特犹豫片刻，似乎不知道该不该说下去。{/n}“我的灵魂崩溃了。我失去了克鲁达拉赫，目睹了科摩罗的恐怖，还有黑暗灵族对我的折磨……我也付出了相应的代价。我迷失了我的道途，我再也不能……冥想了。我的身体和灵魂再也没有一刻安宁，饥渴女士很快会将垂涎的目光集中在我的身上。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Me duele constatar las penurias que has sufrido por mi causa. Y aún las sigues sufriendo en esta arena maldita, en esta maldita ciudad. Yo también...». {n}Yrliet hace una pausa, como dudando si debe continuar.{/n} «Mi alma está afligida, elantach. La destrucción de Crudarach, los horrores de Commorragh y los métodos de reeducación de los Drukhari... He pagado el precio en su plenitud. Me he apartado de mi senda y ya no logro... meditar. Mi cuerpo y mi alma ya no conocen la paz. Y eso quiere decir que la Sedienta no tardará en dirigir su voraz mirada hacia mí».
languages.original_text: "It pains me to know the hardships you had to endure because of me. And you still suffer — in this cursed arena, in this cursed city. I also..." {n}Yrliet pauses as if hesitant to continue.{/n} "My soul is crushed, elantach. The loss of Crudarach, the horrors of Commorragh, and the Drukhari's attempts to re-educate me... I have fully paid the price. I have lost my Path and can no longer... meditate. My body and my soul know no peace now. And that means that She Who Thirsts will soon turn her predatory gaze on me."

traits.locale_text: «Me duele constatar las penurias que has sufrido por mi causa. Y aún las sigues sufriendo en esta arena maldita, en esta maldita ciudad. Yo también...». {n}Yrliet hace una pausa, como dudando si debe continuar.{/n} «Mi alma está afligida, elantach. La destrucción de Crudarach, los horrores de Commorragh y los métodos de reeducación de los Drukhari... He pagado el precio en su plenitud. Me he apartado de mi senda y ya no logro... meditar. Mi cuerpo y mi alma ya no conocen la paz. Y eso quiere decir que la Sedienta no tardará en dirigir su voraz mirada hacia mí».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je suis vraiment peinée en pensant à ce que vous avez dû endurer par ma faute. Et vous souffrez encore, dans cette maudite arène, dans cette horrible ville. Moi aussi, je... » {n}Yrliet s'interrompt un instant, hésitante.{/n} « Mon âme est brisée, elantach. La disparition de Crudarach, les horreurs de Commorragh et les tentatives de rééducation que les Drukharis m'ont fait subir... J'ai enduré un calvaire. J'ai perdu ma Voie et je ne parviens plus à... méditer. Mon corps et mon âme ne connaissent plus la paix, désormais. Cela signifie que l'Assoiffée me prendra bientôt en chasse. »
languages.original_text: "It pains me to know the hardships you had to endure because of me. And you still suffer — in this cursed arena, in this cursed city. I also..." {n}Yrliet pauses as if hesitant to continue.{/n} "My soul is crushed, elantach. The loss of Crudarach, the horrors of Commorragh, and the Drukhari's attempts to re-educate me... I have fully paid the price. I have lost my Path and can no longer... meditate. My body and my soul know no peace now. And that means that She Who Thirsts will soon turn her predatory gaze on me."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis vraiment peinée en pensant à ce que vous avez dû endurer par ma faute. Et vous souffrez encore, dans cette maudite arène, dans cette horrible ville. Moi aussi, je... » {n}Yrliet s'interrompt un instant, hésitante.{/n} « Mon âme est brisée, elantach. La disparition de Crudarach, les horreurs de Commorragh et les tentatives de rééducation que les Drukharis m'ont fait subir... J'ai enduré un calvaire. J'ai perdu ma Voie et je ne parviens plus à... méditer. Mon corps et mon âme ne connaissent plus la paix, désormais. Cela signifie que l'Assoiffée me prendra bientôt en chasse. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Es schmerzt mich, dass Ihr wegen mir so viel erdulden musstet. Und Ihr leidet noch immer – in dieser verfluchten Arena, in dieser verfluchten Stadt. Außerdem ..." {n}Yrliet zögert, fortzufahren.{/n} "Meine Seele ist zerschmettert, Elantach. Der Verlust von Crudarach, die Schrecken von Commorragh und die Versuche der Drukhari, mich umzuerziehen ... Ich habe den vollen Preis bezahlt. Ich habe meinen Pfad verloren und kann nicht mehr ... meditieren. Mein Körper und meine Seele kennen jetzt keinen Frieden mehr. Und das bedeutet, dass Sie, die dürstet, bald ihren Raubtierblick auf mich richten wird."
languages.original_text: "It pains me to know the hardships you had to endure because of me. And you still suffer — in this cursed arena, in this cursed city. I also..." {n}Yrliet pauses as if hesitant to continue.{/n} "My soul is crushed, elantach. The loss of Crudarach, the horrors of Commorragh, and the Drukhari's attempts to re-educate me... I have fully paid the price. I have lost my Path and can no longer... meditate. My body and my soul know no peace now. And that means that She Who Thirsts will soon turn her predatory gaze on me."

traits.locale_text: "Es schmerzt mich, dass Ihr wegen mir so viel erdulden musstet. Und Ihr leidet noch immer – in dieser verfluchten Arena, in dieser verfluchten Stadt. Außerdem ..." {n}Yrliet zögert, fortzufahren.{/n} "Meine Seele ist zerschmettert, Elantach. Der Verlust von Crudarach, die Schrecken von Commorragh und die Versuche der Drukhari, mich umzuerziehen ... Ich habe den vollen Preis bezahlt. Ich habe meinen Pfad verloren und kann nicht mehr ... meditieren. Mein Körper und meine Seele kennen jetzt keinen Frieden mehr. Und das bedeutet, dass Sie, die dürstet, bald ihren Raubtierblick auf mich richten wird."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「私のために、あなたが耐えなければならなかった苦難を知るのは辛いのだ。この呪われた闘技場で、この呪われた街で。それに…」{n}続けるのをためらうかのように、ユリエットは立ち止まる。{/n}「私の魂は打ち砕かれた、エランタよ。クルダラを失い、コモラフで恐怖を味わい、デュカーリが私を再教育しようとした…完全に代償を払ったんだ。私は道を失い、もはや瞑想もできない。私の肉体と魂には安らぎがないんだ。そしてそれは、〈かの渇きたる女〉が間もなく私を捕食しようと、そのまなざしを向けることを意味する」
languages.original_text: "It pains me to know the hardships you had to endure because of me. And you still suffer — in this cursed arena, in this cursed city. I also..." {n}Yrliet pauses as if hesitant to continue.{/n} "My soul is crushed, elantach. The loss of Crudarach, the horrors of Commorragh, and the Drukhari's attempts to re-educate me... I have fully paid the price. I have lost my Path and can no longer... meditate. My body and my soul know no peace now. And that means that She Who Thirsts will soon turn her predatory gaze on me."

traits.locale_text: 「私のために、あなたが耐えなければならなかった苦難を知るのは辛いのだ。この呪われた闘技場で、この呪われた街で。それに…」{n}続けるのをためらうかのように、ユリエットは立ち止まる。{/n}「私の魂は打ち砕かれた、エランタよ。クルダラを失い、コモラフで恐怖を味わい、デュカーリが私を再教育しようとした…完全に代償を払ったんだ。私は道を失い、もはや瞑想もできない。私の肉体と魂には安らぎがないんだ。そしてそれは、〈かの渇きたる女〉が間もなく私を捕食しようと、そのまなざしを向けることを意味する」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Benim yüzümden katlanmak zorunda kaldığın zorlukları düşününce çok üzülüyorum. Bu lanetli arenada, bu lanetli şehirde hâlâ acı çekiyorsun. Ben de..." {n}Yrliet, sözüne devam etmekten çekinircesine susuyor.{/n} "Ruhum eziliyor elantach. Crudarach'ın kaybı, Commorragh'taki dehşet ve Drukharilerin beni yeniden eğitmeye çalışması... Bedelimi ödedim. Yolumu kaybettim ve artık meditasyon yapamıyorum. Bedenim ve ruhum artık huzura erişemiyor. Susayan, yakında vahşi bakışlarını üzerime çevirir."
languages.original_text: "It pains me to know the hardships you had to endure because of me. And you still suffer — in this cursed arena, in this cursed city. I also..." {n}Yrliet pauses as if hesitant to continue.{/n} "My soul is crushed, elantach. The loss of Crudarach, the horrors of Commorragh, and the Drukhari's attempts to re-educate me... I have fully paid the price. I have lost my Path and can no longer... meditate. My body and my soul know no peace now. And that means that She Who Thirsts will soon turn her predatory gaze on me."

traits.locale_text: "Benim yüzümden katlanmak zorunda kaldığın zorlukları düşününce çok üzülüyorum. Bu lanetli arenada, bu lanetli şehirde hâlâ acı çekiyorsun. Ben de..." {n}Yrliet, sözüne devam etmekten çekinircesine susuyor.{/n} "Ruhum eziliyor elantach. Crudarach'ın kaybı,Commorragh'taki dehşet ve Drukharilerin beni yeniden eğitmeye çalışması... Bedelimi ödedim. Yolumu kaybettim ve artık meditasyon yapamıyorum. Bedenim ve ruhum artık huzura erişemiyor. Susayan, yakında vahşi bakışlarını üzerime çevirir."
